data.title: Zhenchenko Victor Vasylyovych
data.meta_description: Ukrainian singer (bass), poet and translator. Performer of songs, romances, and arias by Ukrainian and foreign composers. Member of the National Union of Writers of Ukraine (since 1975), Honored Artist of Ukraine, Honored Artist of Ukraine. He worked at the Ukrainian Cultural Foundation. Biography. Viktor Zhenchenko was born on October 11, 1936, in the village […]
